title: $:/litClock/times/-08:15-Jerome K Jerome
quote_first: It was in the winter when this happened, very near the shortest day, and a week of fog into the bargain, so the fact that it was still very dark when George woke in the morning was no guide to him as to the time. He reached up, and hauled down his watch. It was a

quote_last: . (And here time forked.) I’ll turn it on.” The screen In its blank broth evolved a lifelike blur, And music welled.
